page.title: 13Law and Order in Exbourne
page.content: The nearest Police Station is in Okehampton. A police car is driven round the village about once a week. There is a Community Policeman who is a liason between the school,the village and the Police. He visits the school to talk about road safety,not going with strangers, etc. There is no vandalism or crime here,just perhaps a bit of apple scrumping in the Autumn. Nobody bothers locking cars or houses,we feel quite safe walking at night,even with no street lights. The problems of big cities are completely alien to us. However,we have to take the school computer home in the holidays as small schools are regularly broken into,by people coming into the area.
